required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Explore the Relationship Between the Percentage of Overspeed of Colonoscopy Withdrawal and the Rate of Adenoma Detection:a Prospective、Multicenter、Observational Study

brief_summary.textblock: Exploring the relationship between the percentage of overspeed of colonoscopy withdrawal and the rate of adenoma detection.

intervention.description: Collecting the colonoscopy videos and analyzing the correlation between withdrawal overspeed proportion and adenoma detection rate.

study_pop.textblock: Patients need to receive the colonoscopy examination.
